item.title: Resume
item.description: Currently i’m employed at the municipality of Nijmegen (the Netherlands) as a Researcher. And i like to tinker with R =). I have a masters degree both in Sociology and Urban Geography. In my work I specialize in quantitative research and data science. And this is me =):
